item.title: 美国银行利润增长，但高管们提出更多关税警告
item.description: 美国主要银行第一季度的利润超过预期，股票交易也随之跃升，但高管们周五警告说，全面关税可能会加剧风险并拖累经济增长。【原文：Profits at major U.S. banks beat forecasts in the first quarter as stock trading jumped, but executives warned on Friday that sweeping tariffs could fuel risks and weigh on economic growth.】

item.title: 贸易动荡阻碍新兴市场债券销售盛宴
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提高关税后引发的动荡，使新兴市场 4 月份的主权债务销售突然停滞，而此前发展中国家和公司的债务发行打破了第一季度的记录。【原文：Turmoil in the wake of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff hikes has abruptly stalled emerging market sovereign debt sales in April, after issuance from developing nations and companies shattered first-quarter records.】

item.title: 泰国部长表示泰国将削减美国玉米进口关税
item.description: 泰国财政部长周五表示，泰国将削减从美国进口玉米的关税，但数量仍有待敲定。【原文：Thailand will cut tariffs on imports of corn from the United States, but volumes still need to be finalised, the finance minister said on Friday.】

item.title: 埃尼集团向 KKR 出售生物燃料部门股权，从中获利 36 亿欧元
item.description: 意大利能源集团埃尼（Eni）周五表示，已完成向美国基金KKR出售Enilive公司5%的额外股份，从而使出售其生物燃料部门两股少数股权的总收益达到36亿欧元（41亿美元）。【原文：Italian energy group Eni said on Friday it completed the sale of an additional 5% stake in Enilive to U.S. fund KKR, bringing the total proceeds from the disposal of two minority stakes in its biofuel unit to 3.6 billion euros ($4.1 billion).】

item.title: 美国 3 月份生产者月度价格下降
item.description: 由于能源产品成本大幅下降，美国 3 月份月度生产者价格意外下降，但预计未来几个月进口关税将推动通胀率上升。【原文：U.S. monthly producer prices unexpectedly fell in March amid a sharp decline in the cost of energy products, but tariffs on imports are expected to drive inflation higher in the coming months.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称汇丰正在探索推动私人信贷发展
item.description: 五位知情人士透露，汇丰银行正准备进军白热化的私人信贷市场，这是一家全球性银行涉足这一蓬勃发展行业的最新举措。【原文：HSBC is preparing a foray into the white-hot market for private credit, five sources with knowledge of the plans said, the latest move by a global bank to get in on the booming sector.】

item.title: 德国 Birkenstocks、啤酒和雷司令葡萄酒被美国列入关税清单
item.description: 在电影《芭比娃娃》中，这个标志性的娃娃面临着一个关键的抉择：是选择她标志性的但不实用的高跟鞋，还是选择脚踏实地、舒适的典型德国式 Birkenstock 凉鞋？【原文：In the Barbie movie, the iconic doll faces a pivotal decision: opt for her trademark but impractical sky-high stilettos or embrace the down-to-earth comfort of the quintessentially German Birkenstock sandal?】

item.title: 法斯顿公司的订单增加抵消了工业用品需求的疲软
item.description: 周五，Fastenal 公司公布的第一季度收入和利润与华尔街的预期一致，原因是其紧固件和其他工业用品的合同价值较高，帮助其抵消了制造业和建筑业的需求疲软。【原文：Fastenal reported first-quarter revenue and profit in-line with Wall Street's estimates on Friday, as higher-value contracts for its fasteners and other industrial supplies helped it offset weaker demand from manufacturing and construction sectors.】

item.title: 卡什卡利美联储应勉强干预，仍需完成应对通胀的工作
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联储主席尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周五表示，美联储只应在真正紧急情况下勉强干预市场。【原文：The Federal Reserve should intervene in markets only reluctantly and in a true emergency, Minneapolis Fed President Neel Kashkari said on Friday.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现公司称亿万富翁马龙将退出董事会，成为名誉董事长
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司周五表示，有线电视先驱和大股东约翰-马龙将从董事会卸任，并转任名誉董事长，这是这家媒体巨头最近几周内的第二次董事会变动。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery said on Friday cable TV pioneer and major shareholder John Malone would step down from its board and transition to chairman emeritus, the second boardroom change at the media giant in recent weeks.】

item.title: 经济衰退和通胀担忧加剧，美国债券基金遭遇大量资金外流
item.description: 截至4月9日的一周内，投资者大量撤出美国债券基金，经济衰退的担忧和中美贸易战升级可能加剧通胀的担忧引发了大范围的抛售。【原文：Investors pulled out of U.S. bond funds heavily in the week ending April 9 in a broad selloff triggered by fears of a recession and concerns that the escalating U.S.-China trade war could fuel inflation.】

item.title: 据 Automobilwoche 报道，梅赛德斯将停产 Citan 和 T 级车型
item.description: 据 Automobilwoche 新闻社周五援引一份通知经销商的文件报道，梅赛德斯-奔驰将停止生产 Citan 和 T 级车型。【原文：Mercedes-Benz will end production of its Citan and T-class models, the Automobilwoche news outlet reported on Friday citing a document informing dealers about the decision.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利利润超预期，财富和股票交易部门表现强劲
item.description: 由于股票交易和财富管理业务强劲，摩根士丹利第一季度利润超出预期，使其股价在周五收盘前上涨了 1.9%。【原文：Morgan Stanley beat first-quarter profit estimates on strength in equity trading and wealth management, sending its shares up 1.9% before the bell on Friday.】

item.title: 亚洲现货价格因需求疲软和经济衰退担忧跌至八个月低点
item.description: 受需求疲软、库存高企以及对美国总统特朗普实施全球关税引发全球经济衰退的担忧影响，本周亚洲液化天然气（LNG）现货价格跌至八个多月低点。【原文：Asian spot liquefied natural gas (LNG) prices slid to an over eight-month low this week, weighed by weak demand, high stocks and concerns of a global recession triggered by U.S. President Trump's implementation of worldwide tariffs.】

item.title: 全球债券基金创五年多来最大单周流出量
item.description: 在截至4月9日的一周内，全球债券基金创下五年多来最大单周流出量，原因是投资者担心经济衰退和中美贸易战升级，加剧了对美国通胀的担忧，甚至从传统上较为安全的债券中撤资。【原文：Global bond funds saw their largest weekly outflow in over five years in the week to April 9, as investors pulled back even from traditionally safer bonds amid recession fears and an escalating U.S.-China trade war that are stoking concerns over inflation in the United States.】

item.title: 印度贸易官员：印度和美国敲定贸易协定第一阶段的职权范围
item.description: 一位贸易官员周五表示，印度和美国已经敲定了双边贸易协议第一部分谈判的职权范围，并补充说，该协议有可能在未来 90 天内以 "双赢的形式 "达成。【原文：India and the U.S. have finalised terms of reference for talks over the first segment of a bilateral trade deal, a trade official said on Friday, adding that there was a possibility of a "win-win shape and form" to the deal in the next 90 days.】

item.title: 富国银行因财富管理业务强劲而实现利润增长
item.description: 在财富管理业务强劲表现的推动下，富国银行第一季度利润增长了 6%。【原文：Wells Fargo's profit rose 6% in the first quarter, driven by robust performance in its wealth management business.】

item.title: 关于关税的一切欧洲央行的五个问题
item.description: 欧洲中央银行将于 4 月 17 日召开会议，重点关注关税混乱对决策者需要进一步降息多少的影响。【原文：The European Central Bank meets on April 17 with all focus on what tariff chaos means for how much further policymakers will need to cut rates.】

item.title: 摩根大通利润因交易和交易额增长而飙升
item.description: 摩根大通第一季度利润增长了 9%，主要得益于交易费用的增加和股票交易的创纪录表现。【原文：JPMorgan Chase's first-quarter profit rose 9%, helped by higher fees from dealmaking and a record performance in equities trading.】

item.title: Yandex 共同所有人将增持竞争对手俄罗斯科技公司 VK 的股份
item.description: 周五发表的一份 VK 声明显示，俄罗斯科技公司 Yandex 的共同所有人之一帕维尔-普拉斯（Pavel Prass）将通过他持有少数股份的另一家公司增持 Yandex 竞争对手 VK 的股份。【原文：One of the co-owners of Russian tech company Yandex , Pavel Prass, is set to increase his stake in Yandex rival VK through another company he has a minority stake in, a VK statement published on Friday showed.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称中国推迟批准吉利、比亚迪在拉美的投资计划
item.description: 两位知情人士称，由于美国关税加剧了贸易和经济的不确定性，中国正在推迟批准中国汽车制造商吉利（GEELY.UL）和比亚迪在拉美生产汽车的计划。【原文：China is delaying approval for plans by Chinese automakers Geely (GEELY.UL) and BYD to produce cars in Latin America as U.S. tariffs fuel trade and economic uncertainties, two people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 受托管资产激增影响，纽约银行 2025 年首季利润增长
item.description: 周五，纽约银行公布第一季度利润大增 17%，原因是其托管资产增加，从而提高了手续费收入。【原文：BNY reported a 17% jump in first-quarter profit on Friday as it managed higher assets under custody that boosted its fee income.】

item.title: 早间竞标：资本外逃担忧令美元下挫
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 震撼金融市场的十个交易日
item.description: 竹内顺太郎说，这种痛苦是十分的。【原文：The pain, said Shuntaro Takeuchi, was 10 out of 10.】

item.title: 瑞士银行游说团加强对瑞银迁址风险的警告
item.description: 瑞士主要的银行业游说团体周五表示，如果瑞银被赶走，瑞士经济可能面临严重后果，并加强了对该银行面临过度监管风险的警告。【原文：Switzerland's main banking lobby on Friday said the Swiss economy could face serious consequences if UBS were driven away, intensifying warnings about the risks of hitting the bank with excessive regulations.】

item.title: 美国芯片制造商外包生产将逃避中国关税
item.description: 根据中国主要半导体协会周五发布的通知，外包生产的美国芯片制造商将免受中国对美国进口产品征收报复性关税的影响。【原文：U.S. chipmakers which outsource manufacturing will be exempt from China's retaliatory tariffs on U.S. imports, according to a notice by the main Chinese semiconductor association on Friday.】

item.title: 痛苦的一周过后，投资者处于高度焦虑状态
item.description: 数万亿美元的市场价格被抹去，又被重新纳入投资组合，这导致投资者高度焦虑，一些人在等待特朗普政府的关税政策如何变化的同时，也采取了降低风险头寸的举措。【原文：Trillions of dollars in market prices alternately have been wiped off and added back to portfolios, leading to high anxiety among investors and a move by some to dial down risky positions as they wait to see how the Trump administration's policy on tariffs shakes out.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中美贸易战升级，中国交易所限制每日股票销售
item.description: 周五，四位消息人士称，中国股市已对对冲基金和大型散户投资者的股票净卖出设置了每日限制，因为在与美国的贸易战愈演愈烈之际，中国政府正在加大对股市的支持力度。【原文：Chinese bourses have set daily restrictions on net share sales by hedge funds and large retail investors, four sources said on Friday, as Beijing steps up support for its stock markets in an intensifying trade war with the United States.】

item.title: 贝莱德季度利润因成本增加而下降
item.description: 周五，贝莱德公布第一季度利润下降，原因是全球最大的资产管理公司因支出增加而受到冲击。【原文：BlackRock posted a drop in first-quarter profit on Friday as the world's largest asset manager took a hit from higher expenses.】

item.title: 欧佩克增产和贸易战让美国石油生产商对 "钻宝宝 "保持警惕
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统上任第一天就提出要增加美国的石油和天然气产量，但实际上，由于欧佩克原油产量增加和时好时坏的关税抑制了需求，美国的石油行业已经开始考虑削减产量和工作岗位。【原文：President Donald Trump moved on his first day in office to increase U.S. oil and gas production, but the country's oil industry is actually starting to think about cutting output and jobs due to a double whammy of higher crude output from OPEC and on-again, off-again tariffs that have dented demand.】
